Articles.Content:
So I'm trying to dock a capsule with some RCS, kethane tanks, etc to my munar space station for remote tech because there's only one capsule so it can't be a command center, bill was in the capsule, calm as I'd ever seen him, and after an hour or so of tension, when the ship finally docks and Jeb greets Bill, he had a smile on his face and moved his arms like he was clapping, and acting excited. And for some reason it made me excited, and for a second I felt like I was there, in the game sitting in the command center.

Its funny how ksp makes you feel like your running a real space program sometimes
I had the same thing, espescially landing on the Mun...Until stickykeys happened and I couldn't slow down.

I had a moment like that just recently, i finally made it to the mun, landed and planted my flag. It really is an enjoyable game because its as challenging as you want it to be, i cant wait to learn more. only been playing a week .

By the way, where can i get the kethane tanks and science stuff?
